thread.section_title: Nebraska Furniture Mart Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Nebraska Furniture Mart | nfm.com | 21 of 472
thread.title: Steven
thread.title_full: Nebraska Furniture Mart reviewed by Steven

author: Steven
title: Steven
text:
Ive bought multiple items from NFM over the last 2 years Furniture, Appliances, now a Television, I have never had a issue. Employees are knowledgeable, Store is always clean, always someone around to help.
Purchases from them in store or online are supremely easy. I will always come back here.
